pages.title: Mirror Send Me Home
pages.text: This Chant will save a wandering player trapped by their own curiosity, recklessness, or both. The Chant only works in the $(l:dimensions/mirror)Mirror$(/l) dimension, and will teleport back the lost traveller to their original $(l:dimensions/mirror#room_travel)Mirror$(/l) room. A short cooldown is needed before this Chant can be used again.
